name: Reminisce (Gjemel Likaj)
description:
Reminisce - is a casual narrative driven game about shared memories of me (Gjemel Likaj) and one of my best friends (Cagatay Aydin). You progress through mini-games through the story which all share a funny twist to them. What makes the game special is that it is based on true stories which are slightly visualised.

Reminisce is still in early development.

CREDITS-TEAM:

Gjemel Likaj : Programmer 

Cagatay Aydin: Game-Designer

Junjie Zhang: Game Artist

TOOLS:

Game Engine: Unity 2020.1.1f1

Asset Production: Photoshop  

Programming: Visual Studio (C#)

Project Managment: Miro

CREDITS - UNIVERSITY OF APPLIED SCIENCES EUROPE:

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof.Sebastian Stamm
